Articles.Content: I haven't had any limited likes pop up windows in a while now, did they remove it? I tried liking 25+ posts in the great forum test thread and i still haven't got notified. Has the limit been increased?

just made a test on an old thread, seem the limit is still here, dropped like 23 there and as i dropped a few after login, seem the limit is still here

but it's already been discussed a few time, and tend to fall in the 5 post and duplicated account kind of stuff, if i remind well

 

Edited September 25, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''
